source.description: Sustainable Development Goal 4 (Quality Education) indicators from UN Statistics Division.

source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Quality Education
goal.full_title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
goal.description: Goal 4 aims to ensure inclusive and equitable quality education at all levels. It focuses on access to early childhood development, free primary and secondary education, affordable vocational training, and eliminating gender and wealth disparities.

targets.text: By 2030, ensure all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education
By 2030, ensure all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development
By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education
By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills for employment
By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access for the vulnerable
By 2030, ensure all youth and a substantial proportion of adults achieve literacy and numeracy
